body_html: Closing this issue as it's too broad. For the common case where graphs have one compute device and many parameter server devices we currently support automatic placement. For more complicated cases it's an open research problem how to do this.
body_text: Closing this issue as it's too broad. For the common case where graphs have one compute device and many parameter server devices we currently support automatic placement. For more complicated cases it's an open research problem how to do this.
